contentrichtext.text: '''Tom Singh''' [[Order of the British Empire|OBE]] (born 1949) is the founder of the [[New Look (store)|New Look]] chain of high street fashion stores in the United Kingdom. He is the eldest brother of author and broadcaster Dr [[Simon Singh]]. He is a graduate of the [[University of Wales]].<ref>{{cite news|last=Leroux|first=Marcus|title=Bigshot of the week|url=http://business.timesonline.co.uk/tol/business/movers_and_shakers/article7025684.ece|accessdate=4 February 2011|newspaper=The Times|date=13 Feb 2011|location=London}}</ref> He was appointed an [[Order of the British Empire|OBE]] in the New Year's Honours List December 2006.<ref>{{cite news|title=Rod and Zara top New Year Honours|url=http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/uk/6217693.stm|work=BBC News website|accessdate=4 February 2011|date=30 December 2006}}</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Singh, Tom | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = British businessman | DATE OF BIRTH = 1949 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Singh, Tom}} [[Category:1949 births]] [[Category:English businesspeople]] [[Category:Businesspeople in fashion]] [[Category:English Sikhs]] [[Category:Alumni of Aberystwyth University]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:English people of Indian descent]] [[Category:People educated at Wellington School, Somerset]] {{England-business-bio-stub}} {{UK-business-bio-1940s-stub}}
